lines.text: I could go buy something at the store - those people *have* to talk to you.
I should eat at home and save my money for call girls.
At least this is better than my last job, changing those aromatic urinal cakes.
My heart is bound to explode if I keep eating like this.
My chin is being swallowed up by the abyss once known as my neck
Am I going insane? I hope I'm just drunk!
I wish I could safely pull out my heart and massage it
This is kind of expensive, but it'll be worth it to go out on a date.
